perturbation.original_text:
2.  DEFINITIONS AND INTERPRETATION 
 
2.1 Unless otherwise defined, capitalised terms, singular or plural, used in this Agreement shall have the meaning set out below:
 
“Aircraft”
 
means collectively or individually as the context requires the ATR aircraft listed in Exhibit 1 (“List
of ATR Aircraft covered under this Agreement”), amended from time to time by way of notice sent
to the Company , as relevant, by Repairer in order to cover any further ATR aircraft entering the
Company’s fleet, including the airframe, engines, propellers and landing gears and parts installed
on the Aircraft, when solely operated by the Company ;
perturbation.changed_text:
2.  DEFINITIONS AND INTERPRETATION 
 
2.1 Unless otherwise defined, capitalised terms, singular or plural, used in this Agreement shall have the meaning set out below:
 
“Aircraft”
 
means the ATR aircraft used by the company.
perturbation.explanation: The changed text omits the critical reference to 'Exhibit 1' which lists the aircraft covered by the agreement. By only stating 'ATR aircraft used by the company', a contradiction is introduced. Other sections like pricing and maintenance schedules are directly linked to specific Aircraft models in Exhibit 1. The enforcement becomes uncertain because the specific aircraft covered is now ambiguous.

perturbation.original_text:
2.1 Unless otherwise defined, capitalised terms, singular or plural, used in this Agreement shall have the meaning set out below:
...
“LOC” or
“StandBy Letter of
Credit”
 
means an irrevocable letter of credit in the form or substantial form stipulated by Exhibit 13 (“Form
of StandBy Letter of Credit”), in accordance with Uniform Customs and Practice (“UCP”) for the
documentary credit, 2007 revision, ICC publication n°600, issued by a major international bank,
confirmed by and domiciliated in NATIXIS, Paris, France, provided by the Company to the Repairer
in accordance with Clause 13 (“Security Deposit”) of this Agreement;
perturbation.changed_text:
2.1 Unless otherwise defined, capitalised terms, singular or plural, used in this Agreement shall have the meaning set out below:
...
“LOC” or
“StandBy Letter of
Credit”
 
means an irrevocable letter of credit provided by the company;
perturbation.explanation: The changed text omits the specifications outlined by 'Exhibit 13' and 'Clause 13', making it unclear on what basis LOC needs to be provided. Later, the clause can be referenced, but not the specifics, making it confusing to enforce it.

perturbation.original_text:
12.  INVOICING AND PAYMENT TERMS  
 
12.1 The Repairer shall invoice the Company:
 
 
(i)
[*****]
 
 
(ii)
[*****]
 
 
[*****]
 
 
[*****]
[*****]
perturbation.changed_text:
12.  INVOICING AND PAYMENT TERMS  
 
12.1 The Repairer shall invoice the Company:
 
 
(i)
Based on what they see fit.
perturbation.explanation: By changing the billing from something clear to 'Based on what they see fit', there is no specific value that can be calculated. Thus, any calculation and invoicing with that missing would be incomplete.
